properties.name: None
properties.description: Zero: Ordinal numerals do not exist

properties.name: One, two, three
properties.description: One: No distinction of cardinal and ordinal numerals

properties.name: First, two, three
properties.description: First: Cardinal and ordinal numerals are identical except for 'one' and 'first'

properties.name: One-th, two-th, three-th
properties.description: One-th: One-th: Ordinal numerals are derived from cardinal numerals

properties.name: First/one-th, two-th, three-th
properties.description: First/One-th: All ordinal numerals are derived from cardinal numerals with different allomorphs for 'first' one of which is morphologically independent of 'one'

properties.name: First, two-th, three-th
properties.description: Two-th: Two-th: Ordinal numerals from 'two' upwards are derived from cardinal numerals, 'first' is suppletive

properties.name: First, second, three-th
properties.description: Second: 'First' and a small set of consecutive higher ordinal numerals are suppletive

name: Ordinal Numerals
contributors: Thomas Stolz and Ljuba N. Veselinova
